content.rendered:
Hi David & Karen,

I want to take the opportunity to extend my sincere gratitude to Johnson Consulting Group (especially David, Karen, and Lisa) for assisting me with my partner buyout.  I attended JCG annual summit in February and by March they assembled a team to assist me with my acquisition. Throughout the entire process, they never left my side—and that’s what great consultants do.

JCG is a great organization with great people. This was one of the best strategic relationships that I have been fortunate enough to develop and I look forward to a generational partnership for years to come.

Again, thank you JCG.

~Camelia,

Marcel and Camelia Clarke
Paradise Memorial Funeral Home & Cremation Services, Milwaukee, WI
